blogPost.excerpt: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourself—it's a whole new way to chat.
blogPost.body: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourself—it's a whole new way to chat.
blogPost.title: Honk - Real-time messaging
blogPost.author: Alberto Antoniazzi

localize.description: 喇叭是一种与朋友实时聊天的新方式，当你打字时，消息会实时显示！快，有趣，私密。畅所欲言，做你自己--这是一种全新的聊天方式。
喇叭是一種與朋友實時聊天的新方式，當你打字時，消息會實時顯示！快，有趣，私密。暢所欲言，做你自己--這是一種全新的聊天方式。

previous.excerpt: Spaces provides a clean, distraction free writing environment with intelligent features. Create beautiful notes, add infinite tags & connect everything via backlinks, all in real time. Available on iPhone, iPad & Mac.
previous.title: Spaces - Writing app that never breaks your flow ✍️

localize.description: Spaces提供了一个干净、无分心、具有智能功能的写作环境。创建漂亮的便条，添加无限的标签，并通过反向链接连接一切，所有这些都是实时的。可在iPhone、iPad和Mac上使用。
localize.tagline: 编写永不中断Flow✍️的应用程序

localize.description: Spaces提供了一個乾淨、無分心、具有智能功能的寫作環境。創建漂亮的便條，添加無限的標籤，並通過反向鏈接連接一切，所有這些都是實時的。可在iPhone、iPad和Mac上使用。
localize.tagline: 編寫永不中斷Flow✍️的應用程序

next.excerpt: Reslash is the most fun way to get together online. Recreate the feel of a Christmas party, virtually. Break away from the stress of zoom calls or the hassle of breakout rooms. It's time to celebrate and have fun this holiday season with Reslash!
next.title: Reslash for Christmas - Host the best virtual Christmas party ever

localize.description: Reslash是在线聚会最有趣的方式。虚拟地重现圣诞派对的感觉。摆脱变焦电话的压力或分组房间的麻烦。现在是与Reslash一起庆祝和享受这个节日季节的时候了！
localize.tagline: 举办有史以来最棒的虚拟圣诞派对

localize.description: Reslash是在線聚會最有趣的方式。虛擬地重現聖誕派對的感覺。擺脫變焦電話的壓力或分組房間的麻煩。現在是與Reslash一起慶祝和享受這個節日季節的時候了！
localize.tagline: 舉辦有史以來最棒的虛擬聖誕派對
